tgt_original: 汝非黃門耶？ 汝非二形耶？

tgt_original: 汝非自剃頭自稱比丘尼耶？

src_original: nahi |  mā rājñaḥ kilbiṣakāriṇi |  nahi |  upasampanna-pūrvāsi |  anyadāpi yady āha upasampanna-pūrvā ti |
vaktavyā gaccha nasya cala prapalāhi |  nāsti te upasampadā |  grāhitavyā mā vātilā |  mā pittilā |  mā pindilā |  mā ārdra-vraṇā |  mā śuṣka-vraṇā |  mā śoṇita-vraṇā |  mā śikhiriṇī |
tgt_original: 汝不曾出家持戒不完具耶？

src_original: mā dvi-puruṣikā |  mā puruṣa-dveṣiṇī  36. santi kho punar imasmin kāye vividhā anuśayikā ābādhā sayyathīdaṃ |
tgt_original: 」若隨問答皆言無者，又應問言「女人有如是病：

src_original: dardru kaṇḍū kacchū rakacā |  pāṇḍurogo ālasako |  lohita-pittaṃ jvaro |
tgt_original: 癩病、白癩病、乾痟病、癲狂病、癕疽漏病脂出病。

44. mā bhikṣu-dūṣikā |  nahi |  mā stainya-samvāsikā |
nahi |
mā tirthikā-pakrāntikā |
yāvad bhagavān āha |
yā eṣā kumārī-bhūtā ākāṃkṣati |  tathāgata-pravedite dharma-vinaye upasaṃpadāṃ bhikṣuṇī-bhāvaṃ |  tāya saṃgho dve varṣāṇi śikṣā-deśanā-sammutiṃ yācitavyo |  karma-kārikāya karma kartavyaṃ |
tgt_original: 「今聽諸比丘尼白四羯磨與滿十二歲已嫁女人受具足戒。 彼欲受戒人，應到比丘尼僧中白言：

src_original: śṛṇotu āryā saṃgho |
iyam itthan-nāmā aṣṭādaśa-varṣā kumārī-bhūtā ākāṃkṣati tathāgata-pravedite dharma-vinaye upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇī-bhāvaṃ |
tgt_original: 我某甲，已嫁，滿十二歲，求某甲和上受具足戒。

src_original: yadi saṃghasya prāpta-kālaṃ iyam itthan-nāmā saṃghaṃ dve-varṣāṇi śikṣā-deśanā-sammutiṃ yāceyyā |
kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi |
tgt_original: 僧與我受具足戒，憐愍故。

src_original: sāhaṃ dve varṣāṇi śikṣā-deśanāsammutiṃ yācāmi |  sādhu vata me āryā saṃgho dve varṣāṇi śikṣā-padāni sammutiṃ detu |
tgt_original: 但是請僧量宜可，不請秉法者，幸自詳之。 乞二歲學戒法佛言：

src_original: evaṃ tri-khhatto yācitavyaṃ |
tgt_original: 「欲受學戒人，到比丘尼僧中三乞。 應具威儀，偏露右肩，脫革屣，禮僧足，胡跪合掌白言：

src_original: karma | śṛṇotu me āryā saṃgho |
iyam itthan-namā aṣṭādaśa-varṣā kumārī-bhūtā ākāṃkṣati tathāgata-pravedite dharma-vinaye upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇī-bhāvaṃ |
tgt_original: 我某甲，和上某甲，今從僧乞二歲學戒。 善哉阿姨僧！

src_original: sā saṃghaṃ dve varṣāṇi śikṣā-deśanāsammutiṃ yācati |
tgt_original: 與我二歲學戒，憐愍故。 」三說乞已。

src_original: ovayikā eṣā jñaptiḥ |
